participant_1.name: Emma Johnson
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and expressive, enjoys fun and playful conversations. Loves sharing her interests and is enthusiastic about her hobbies.
participant_1.background: I'm getting married in the spring. I work at a school as a kindergarten teacher. I love eating out with friends. I'm 24 years old. My favorite singer is Taylor Swift.

participant_2.name: Sophia Brown
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and friendly, enjoys simple pleasures and loves to spend time outdoors. Values healthy living and has a playful side.
participant_2.background: I live in a house. I have a boyfriend. I don't drink soda. I like to take walks. I like to eat hamburgers and french fries.
